text.text_translated: PricewaterhouseCoopers (PwC) is a large international firm. It carried out a global survey that collected more than 40,000 responses from millennials (people born between 1983 and 1993) and from other age groups. The survey asked about work culture, communication, working styles, pay structure, career development and work‑life balance. Similarly, Deloitte is another large international firm. It also carried out a global survey and collected more than 10,000 responses from millennials. This survey asked millennials about the threats and opportunities in the complex world of work.
